title: How to Survive in the Workplace
description: Do you have challenges at work? It is inevitable. The workplace is anywhere you earn a living. It is often made up of people of diverse character, attitude and perception. As such you need to know how to survive and succeed in such an environment.So many people are unhappy at work because they lack the basic knowledge of workplace relationship and how to achieve good results at work. They rely solely on their knowledge and ability which is often not enough. This had often led to lack of job satisfaction, stagnation and even job loss.This book gives you insights on how to relate, tolerate and work harmoniously with all your colleagues to achieve your goals.There are two main areas of life we cannot afford to fail- Family and Career. They are both relevant to our overall well-being and fulfillment in life.The principles contained in this book has work for me for many years and I am glad to share them with you.
author: Stella  Oladiran
